title: Chitlins in Paris, Aretha Franklin Prayers, Omarosa Audio, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Uncle Steve VS Nephew Tommy, Breast Feeding Story, Lil' Milton Story, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Chitlins in Paris, Aretha Franklin Prayers, Omarosa Audio, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Uncle Steve VS Nephew Tommy, Breast Feeding Story, Lil' Milton Story, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Still broadcasting live from Paris, the show opens with talk about chitlins in Paris. Social media has celebrities and fans alike praying for Aretha Franklin. Omarosa was interviewed and we have audio. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. Uncle Steve has a funny story about a time that he opened for Lil' Milton. Lorenzo who directs the choir is the focal point of today's Phone Prank. The Strawberry Letter has a situation to say the least. Pastor Motown and Deacon Def Jam speak on the lady who was nursing her child in church. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the Queen of Soul and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
